name: Ride Concepts Livewire Cycling Shoes - Youths
description: The Livewire is the shoe that started it all for Ride Concepts, and the grom’s edition doesn’t cut any corners. Designed around a youth fit, they offer excellent power transfer and ride feel. When off the bike, the supportive midsole adds comfort to sidewalks or standing in the lift line.Rugged synthetic uppers are perforated for breathability.Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Elastic lace tuck keeps laces out of hungry chains.Rubber molded heel and toe protection.D3O® zone tech insoles add protection under the heel and ball of the foot.EVA midsole absorb the bumps your shocks miss.Grippy DST 6.0 rubber sole keep feet firmly on pedals.
